content:
In the list of terminologies value sets there is a value set called ICD10, currently with a limited subset of the ICD10 code system.
What are the plans for this value set? Will it become an aggregated value set like the observation-codes with all LOINC codes? And what are the expected timelines for expansion?
I just committed the updated complete contents of ICD-10 (WHO) to the packages repository a few days ago. Very soon that should be replacing the existing content that is currently on tx.fhir.org.
